Package com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements

Class ElementFunctions

java.lang.Object
com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.ElementFunctions
public class ElementFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
Retrieves as an element as an Element or as a child type. To return as the desired type, we call getElement which returns an Element, and the element is cast as the desired element.

  • Method Details

    • getElement

      public static Element getElement​(java.lang.String elementName)
      Returns a Element object for a given elementName string from current page. Gets current page reference, replaces page name space characters with '_'
      Parameters:
      elementName - String name of requested element
      Returns:
      Element the requested element

    • getElementAsDropdown

      public static Dropdown getElementAsDropdown​(java.lang.String elementName)
      Returns the Dropdown associated with the element name on the currently active page.
      Parameters:
      elementName - String the name of the element to be returned
      Returns:
      Dropdown the drop down associated with the element name on the currently active page

    • getElementAsSelectElement

      public static SelectElement getElementAsSelectElement​(java.lang.String elementName)
      Returns the PageSelectElement associated with the element name on the currently active page.
      Parameters:
      elementName - String the name of the element to be returned
      Returns:
      PageSelectElement the select element associated with the element name on the currently active page

    • getElementAsTable

      public static Table getElementAsTable​(java.lang.String elementName)
      Returns the Table associated with the element name on the currently active page.
      Parameters:
      elementName - String the name of the element to be returned
      Returns:
      Table the table associated with the element name on the currently active page

    • getElementAsCustom

      public static <T> T getElementAsCustom​(java.lang.String elementName)
      Returns an element from the active page in any type you cast it as.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Class the type of element to return
      Parameters:
      elementName - String the name of the element to return
      Returns:
      Class an instance of the class you typed the element as

    • buildClassCastExceptionMessage

      private static java.lang.String buildClassCastExceptionMessage​(java.lang.String elementName, java.lang.String className)
      Returns an error message that is a clearer casting error and logs it.
      Parameters:
      elementName - the element that was improperly used
      className - the page object name
      Returns:
      String the error message to pass to the user

    • waitForEitherElementToExist

      public static boolean waitForEitherElementToExist​(java.lang.String elementName, java.lang.String otherElementName)
      Waits the configured timeout for either of the two elements to be found. Does not take into consideration visibility of elements. Does not take into consideration which element is found first.
      Parameters:
      elementName - String an element to search for.
      otherElementName - String another element to search for.
      Returns:
      boolean true if either of the elements are found within the configured timeout. false otherwise.
